alert.note: Alert for Polk; St. Croix (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 29 at 11:18PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN WASHINGTON... NORTHWESTERN ST. CROIX AND SOUTH CENTRAL POLK COUNTIES THROUGH 1145 PM CDT... At 1117 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hugo, or 19 miles northeast of St. Paul, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Forest Lake, Stillwater, Hugo, New Richmond, Lake Elmo, Scandia, Bayport, Somerset, Star Prairie, Oak Park Heights, Grant, and Otisville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
